msItem.title: An enumeration of the times which each letter of the Alphabet occurs in the the first 30 Surahs of the Koran.
msItem.note: Not in Morley Printed Catalogue. F1b. Impression of seal of Tipu Sultan, dated 1226 (last figureuncertain), probably in Tipu's Mawludi era, for which see Storey, i, 17. But this would make it 1799, the year of Tipu's death. Bound with what Morley describes as A Tract in the Mahrathi character, which also may contain lists of numbers.

bindingDesc.p: Red leather blind-stamped Indian binding. Leather label attached to binding: R.A.S. MS. Cat. 28.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
